video.transcript:
Coach: Let’s start at the beginning – performance planning is the first step in the performance management process.

Performance planning allows you and your team to achieve targets within a time frame. It is important as it enables you to see the current state of your own as well as your team’s business and to see where both will be in the future.

A successful sales business is based on a performance-driven culture. A performance-driven culture means planning your performance and measuring it continuously.

Performance planning is about setting targets and creating a plan to achieve those targets and has to take into account previous performance.

Once the plan is created, you can measure performance against it on an ongoing basis and adjust the plan as required.
